name: TBDRPG
short: A cog for playing a text-based RPG in Discord.
description: This cog is a text-based RPG that can be played in Discord that's meant to reward player-to-player cooperative play.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thanks for intalling the TBDRPG cog! I hope it helps you connect with your friends.
author: zr
